definition: to recover completely (from illness or injury)

sentences.english: I applied a poultice and the abscess opened and began to heal.
sentences.chinese: 我敷上膏药，脓疮迸裂，开始痊愈。

sentences.english: The old wounds never heal, my father says.
sentences.chinese: 旧伤从不会痊愈，我父亲说。

sentences.english: The girl is better, though not yet cured.
sentences.chinese: 女孩好一点了，不过仍未痊愈。

sentences.english: The reverse is experiencing rebirth or healing.
sentences.chinese: 相反的情景是重生或伤病痊愈。

sentences.english: Sagna has a shoulder injury that is still not completely clear.
sentences.chinese: 萨尼亚的肩膀有伤仍没痊愈，但是他会首发。

sentences.english: After taking good care of himself, he recovered from his illness.
sentences.chinese: 经过悉心调养，他的病已痊愈。

sentences.english: I only want him to recover.
The anger is very big, estimated must hit several needles east winds only then to be possible to convalesce.
sentences.chinese: 火气很大，估计要打几针东风才可以痊愈。

sentences.english: Bruises heal but the pain from mental bullying doesn't just go away.
sentences.chinese: 瘀青可以痊愈，但精神创伤却消不掉。

sentences.english: After the traffic accident he lay in bed for a week, wating for his wound to heal.
sentences.chinese: 交通事故发生后他卧床一周，等待伤口痊愈。

sentences.english: Acording to the X-ray, majority were healing in 8~10 months.
sentences.chinese: 线结果显示多数病例在8～10个月后痊愈。

sentences.english: The mortality rate is low in pigs and recovery usually occurs within 7-10 days.
sentences.chinese: 猪的死亡率较低，且通常能在7至10天内痊愈。

sentences.english: The acute phase is mainly to control symptoms, clinical cure effect to target.
sentences.chinese: 急性期主要是控制症状，目标达到临床痊愈效果。

sentences.english: Its adsorptive properties create local effect on the ulcerated area providing a favourable environment for the healing of the ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 并具有吸附作用，能保护溃疡面，有助于溃疡痊愈。

sentences.english: Acupuncture and Moxibustion-temperature can significantly improve the cure rate and overall efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 针刺配合温灸器能显著提高痊愈率和总有效率。

sentences.english: Five others were wounded; they all recovered.
sentences.chinese: 其他五人受了伤，最后都痊愈康复。

definition: variant of 痊癒|痊愈[quan2 yu4]
to recur (of a disease)/to reappear/to relapse (into a former bad state)
to leave hospital/to be discharged from hospital
to recover spontaneously (from an illness)/to get better without medical treatment
